Text: hey! i dont get it to work... whats wrong?

theres nothing wrong with the movies.. if you just want to watch them.  but the problem is if you want to transcode them into dvd format or any other avi/wmn/.mov format besides the one their in now, it dosent work. (no idea why) i tried every prog i know and it cant decode the files. anyhow... if you just wanna watch them on your comp, they play fine. i used vlc media player and it opened them perfectly.
